text.div:
V3 Value SetRoleClassMutualRelationship

A relationship that is based on mutual behavior of the two Entities as being related. The basis of such relationship may be agreements (e.g., spouses, contract parties) or they may bede facto behavior (e.g. friends) or may be an incidental involvement with each other (e.g. parties over a dispute, siblings, children).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a _RoleClassMutualRelationship
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass
    CodeDisplay
    _RoleClassMutualRelationshipRoleClassMutualRelationshipA relationship that is based on mutual behavior of the two Entities as being related. The basis of such relationship may be agreements (e.g., spouses, contract parties) or they may be de facto behavior (e.g. friends) or may be an incidental involvement with each other (e.g. parties over a dispute, siblings, children).
